channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec -- Messaging Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec -- Messaging Gateway

item.title: CVE-2024-23614|2024-09-05T18:28:07.954Z -- symantec -- messaging%20gateway
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Symantec Messaging Gateway versions 9.5 and before. A remote, anonymous attacker can exploit this vulnerability to achieve remote code execution as root.
